4 #ifndef __UART_SYNOPSYS_H_INC__
5 #define __UART_SYNOPSYS_H_INC__

7 #include "utils/generic/generic.h"
8 #include "platformconfig.h"
9 
10 #if CONFIG_USE_UART
11 
12 #define UART_RBR (0x00) /* Read only */
13 #define UART_THR (0x00) /* Write only */
14 #define UART_IER (0x04)
15 #define UART_IIR (0x08) /* Read only */
16 #define UART_FCR (0x08) /* Write only */
17 #define UART_LCR (0x0c)
18 #define UART_MCR (0x10)
19 #define UART_LSR (0x14)
20 #define UART_MSR (0x18)
21 #define UART_SCR (0x1c)
22 #define UART_DLL (0x00) /* Only when LCR.DLAB = 1 */
23 #define UART_DLH (0x04) /* Only when LCR.DLAB = 1 */
24 
25 #define UART_FAR (0x70)
26 #define UART_TFR (0x74) /* Only when LCR = 0xbf */
27 #define UART_RFW (0x78) /* Only when LCR = 0xbf */
28 #define UART_USR (0x7c) /* Only when LCR = 0xbf */
29 #define UART_TFL (0x80) /* Only when LCR = 0xbf */
30 #define UART_RFL (0x84)
31 #define UART_HTX (0xa4)
32 #define UART_DMASA (0xa8)
33 #define UART_CPR (0xf4)
34 #define UART_UCV (0xf8)
35 #define UART_CTR (0xfc)
36 
37 /* IER */
38 #define UART_IER_ERBFI (1<<0)
39 #define UART_IER_ETBEI (1<<1)
40 #define UART_IER_ELSI (1<<2)
41 
42 /* IIR */
43 #define UART_IIR_ID_SHIFT (0)
44 #define UART_IIR_ID_MASK (0x3F)
45 #define UART_IIR_LSR (0x06)
46 #define UART_IIR_RXDATA_TMO (0x0C)
47 #define UART_IIR_RXDATA_RECEIVED (0x04)
48 #define UART_IIR_TX_EMPTY (0x02)
49 #define UART_IIR_NO_INTERRUPT (0x01)
50 
51 /* FCR */
52 #define UART_FCR_FIFOE (1 << 0)
53 #define UART_FCR_CLRR (1 << 1)
54 #define UART_FCR_CLRT (1 << 2)
55 #define UART_FCR_DMA1 (1 << 3)
56 #define UART_FCR_RXFIFO_1B_TRI (0 << 6)
57 #define UART_FCR_RXFIFO_6B_TRI (1 << 6)
58 #define UART_FCR_RXFIFO_12B_TRI (2 << 6)
59 #define UART_FCR_RXFIFO_RX_TRI (3 << 6)
60 #define UART_FCR_TXFIFO_1B_TRI (0 << 4)
61 #define UART_FCR_TXFIFO_4B_TRI (1 << 4)
62 #define UART_FCR_TXFIFO_8B_TRI (2 << 4)
63 #define UART_FCR_TXFIFO_14B_TRI (3 << 4)
64 
65 #define UART_FCR_FIFO_INIT (UART_FCR_FIFOE|UART_FCR_CLRR|UART_FCR_CLRT)
66 #define UART_FCR_NORMAL (UART_FCR_FIFO_INIT | \
67  UART_FCR_TXFIFO_4B_TRI| \
68  UART_FCR_RXFIFO_12B_TRI)
69 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
70 /* LCR */
71 #define UART_LCR_BREAK (1 << 6)
72 #define UART_LCR_DLAB (1 << 7)
73 
74 #define UART_WLS_5 (0 << 0)
75 #define UART_WLS_6 (1 << 0)
76 #define UART_WLS_7 (2 << 0)
77 #define UART_WLS_8 (3 << 0)
78 #define UART_WLS_MASK (3 << 0)
79 
80 #define UART_1_STOP (0 << 2)
81 #define UART_2_STOP (1 << 2)
82 #define UART_1_5_STOP (1 << 2) /* Only when WLS=5 */
83 #define UART_STOP_MASK (1 << 2)
84 
85 #define UART_NONE_PARITY (0 << 3)
86 #define UART_ODD_PARITY (0x1 << 3)
87 #define UART_EVEN_PARITY (0x3 << 3)
88 #define UART_MARK_PARITY (0x5 << 3)
89 #define UART_SPACE_PARITY (0x7 << 3)
90 #define UART_PARITY_MASK (0x7 << 3)
91 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
92 /* MCR */
93 #define UART_MCR_DTR (1 << 0)
94 #define UART_MCR_RTS (1 << 1)
95 #define UART_MCR_OUT1 (1 << 2)
96 #define UART_MCR_OUT2 (1 << 3)
97 #define UART_MCR_LOOP (1 << 4)
98 #define UART_MCR_DCM_EN (1 << 5) /* MT6589 move to bit5 */
99 #define UART_MCR_XOFF (1 << 7) /* read only */
100 #define UART_MCR_NORMAL (UART_MCR_DTR|UART_MCR_RTS)
101 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
102 /* LSR */
103 #define UART_LSR_DR (1 << 0)
104 #define UART_LSR_OE (1 << 1)
105 #define UART_LSR_PE (1 << 2)
106 #define UART_LSR_FE (1 << 3)
107 #define UART_LSR_BI (1 << 4)
108 #define UART_LSR_THRE (1 << 5)
109 #define UART_LSR_TEMT (1 << 6)
110 #define UART_LSR_FIFOERR (1 << 7)
111 
112 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
113 /* MSR */
114 #define UART_MSR_DCTS (1 << 0)
115 #define UART_MSR_DDSR (1 << 1)
116 #define UART_MSR_TERI (1 << 2)
117 #define UART_MSR_DDCD (1 << 3)
118 #define UART_MSR_CTS (1 << 4)
119 #define UART_MSR_DSR (1 << 5)
120 #define UART_MSR_RI (1 << 6)
121 #define UART_MSR_DCD (1 << 7)
122 
123 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
124 /* EFR */
125 #define UART_EFR_RTS (1 << 6)
126 #define UART_EFR_CTS (1 << 7)
127 
129 #ifdef BUILD_FOR_FPGA
130 #define UART_DEFAULT_XTAL_FREQ (24000000) // 24 MHz Clock on FPGA
131 #else
132 #define UART_DEFAULT_XTAL_FREQ (136000000) // 136 MHz PLL
133 #endif
134 
135 #define UART_DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE (115200)
136 #define UART_DEFAULT_DATA_BIT (UART_WLS_8)
137 #define UART_DEFAULT_PARITY (UART_NONE_PARITY)
138 #define UART_DEFAULT_STOP_BIT (UART_1_STOP)
139 
140 #define FRAC_BRG_BITS 6
141 #define FRAC_BRG_VALUE (2^FRAC_BRG_BITS)
142 
148 void UartInit(void);
149 
157 void WriteChar(char data);
158 
166 void ReadChar(char* data);
167 
175 void FlushUart(void);

177 #else
178 
179 // Stub out functions in configurations that don't have UART
180 static inline void UartInit(void) {}
181 static inline void WriteChar(char data) {}
182 static inline void ReadChar(char* data) {}
183 static inline void FlushUart(void) {}

185 #endif // CONFIG_USE_UART
